abstract: English National Opera announces 2016-17 season, which has been significantly reduced due to funding cuts.

headline.print_headline: English National Opera Limits New Productions
headline.main: ‘The Winter’s Tale’ Among New Works at English National Opera

snippet: After a difficult year that included financial cuts, resignations, staff changes and labor battles, the company announced its coming season.
lead_paragraph: After a difficult year that included financial cuts, resignations, staff changes and labor battles, the company announced its coming season.
